ygData.subject: Fwd: RE: Question about experience penalty (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Definitely a full bubble loss at 46.   Remember I said I would reach 47 last night? Well the server crashed while we were doing fire giants in Sol B and
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Message: 23
> Date: Tue, 4 Jan 2000 10:27:21 -0600
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
> Subject: RE: Question about experience penalty (OT)
>
>
> So, while it's hard to gain XP in a Hell Level - it seems that each time you
> are killed - there is less loss than in other levels. FYI - I have heard
> that the Hell plus One levels are one-bub death penaltys for each time you
> die - maybe only 46? Or 41 and 46?


Definitely a full bubble loss at 46. Remember I said I would reach 47 last night?
Well the server crashed while we were doing fire giants in Sol B and Nagafen was
popped when we all returned. So I stuck around until crazy hours on the dragon
raid. Died 3 times *ouch* but only down one bubble total after the resurrections.
And I was alive when he finally fell: that felt good, seeing him fallen at my feet.

And YES I now have Selo's Drums of the March. Yeeehaaahhh! (sorry Kelothos, you
next time)

Maravana Vireo
Level 46 Lore Master Bard of the Jus Divinum
Mithaniel Marr
